mapper.select: SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.regDate, b.viewCnt, b.board_type FROM makeboard b INNER JOIN board_type t ON b.board_type = t.id WHERE b.board_type = #{id} ORDER BY b.bno desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO makeboard(title, writer, content, board_type) VALUES(#{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{board_type})
mapper.select: SELECT id, password, email, phoneNumber, gender, image, enabled, authority FROM user WHERE authority NOT IN ('ROLE_ADMIN')
